prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with shimmering scales and flowing fins.
Imagine a Pokemon that glides through water effortlessly, with bright colors.
Generate a unique aquatic creature inspired by real-life fish species.
Design a Pokemon that has both elegance and speed in its swimming style.
Show me a Pokemon that can create beautiful light patterns underwater.
Make a graceful fish Pokemon that can charm trainers with its looks.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that thrives in deep ocean habitats.
